text:
Currently, the Conditional Formatting code all uses short indexes for colours. That's fine-ish for HSSF, but not ideal for XSSF which rarely uses indexed colours

Much along the lines of how Font and CellStyle work, these conditional formatting classes+interfaces should be updated to support org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Color as well
creator: apache@gagravarr.org

text: I found at least bug 58068, bug 57934 and bug 56774 which all talk about missing methods for "real" colors compared to the indexed ones.
creator: dominik.stadler@gmx.at
apache@gagravarr.org
text: All 3 interfaces + their implementations updated as of r1691083.
